sense.def:
Z besedo
former
povemo, kakšna je neka oseba ali stvar bila prej.

Kadar nekaj
happened or existed in former days
ali
in former years
, se je zgodilo ali obstajalo v preteklosti.

seg.quote: ...a selection of items published in former years.

sense.def:
Kadar sta bili dve osebi ali stvari pravkar omenjeni, prvo med njima lahko označimo z izrazom
the former
.

seg.quote: The former believe in a strong centralized government.
Lack of space forbids the former alternative.
